commits.content:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; export const AuthorBooks = () => { const [books, setBooks] = useState([ { id: 1, title: "Your Daily Astrological Guide", language: "English", author: "Jay Yadav", price: 150, genre: "Astrology", isbn: "9788198388094", pages: 68, coverType: "Paperback", publishingDetails: { edition: "07 Jan 2025", quantity: 7, mrp: 150, royaltyPercentage: 20, soldCopies: 0, royaltyEarned: 0 }, authorsPurchase: [ { date: "07 Jan 2025", particulars: "Your Daily Astrological Guide [English]Complimentary Copies", quantity: 5, mrp: 150, discount: 100, total: 0, paymentStatus: "Paid" } ] } ]); return (

Author / Books Management

{books.map((book) => (
{book.title} [{book.language}]
Book Details
Author
{book.author}
Price
₹{book.price}
Genre
{book.genre}
ISBN
{book.isbn}
Pages
{book.pages}
Cover
{book.coverType}
Publishing Details
Edition {book.publishingDetails.edition}
Quantity {book.publishingDetails.quantity}
MRP ₹{book.publishingDetails.mrp}
Royalty (%) {book.publishingDetails.royaltyPercentage}%
Sold {book.publishingDetails.soldCopies}
Royalty Earned ₹{book.publishingDetails.royaltyEarned}
Author's Purchase History
{book.authorsPurchase.map((purchase, index) => ( ))}
Date Particulars Quantity MRP Discount Total Status
{purchase.date} {purchase.particulars} {purchase.quantity} ₹{purchase.mrp} {purchase.discount}% ₹{purchase.total} {purchase.paymentStatus}
))}
); };
